attributes.action: Regulate the price of PCR tests for travel and make them fairly priced for all
attributes.additional_details: To make travel and PCR prices fairer for all.
attributes.background: PCR tests for travel are to over priced and should be standardised and made a fair price for all. As the government requires them for travel why are they almost £100 per person. Imagine a family of 5 or 6.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593541
